files.name: main.py
files.content:
def addNumbers (a, b):
    add = a + b
    return add

def multiplyNumbers (a, b):
    multiply = a * b 
    return multiply
    
    
while(True):
    firstNumber = int(input("Enter a number (0 to exit): "))
    
    if(firstNumber == 0): break
    secondNumber = int(input("Enter another number: "))
    
    addInts = addNumbers(firstNumber, secondNumber)
    print(firstNumber, "+", secondNumber, "=", addInts)
    
    multiplyInts = multiplyNumbers(firstNumber, secondNumber)
    print(firstNumber, "*", secondNumber, "=", multiplyInts)
    
print("All done.")
